channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kanchha Sherpa, Last Member of First Team to Conquer Everest, Dies at 92
item.description: A trip to India to find work led to a career climbing the world’s highest mountain.

item.title: Meet the Resy CMO using data to shape your next great meal
item.description: Resy is pursuing a marketing strategy that turns restaurant data into cultural currency.

item.title: Ben Stiller Honors His Parents In ‘Stiller & Meara: Nothing Is Lost’
item.description: How to lead an artistic life and be part of a family is a tension he has only recently faced in life and now, onscreen, for a film about his comedian ...

item.title: The protein craze is heavy metal, literally: bombshell investigation finds unsafe lead amounts in two-thirds of top powders for sale
item.description: Paris Martineau said Consumer Reports found “concerning levels” of heavy metals in a 2010 investigation, but the risks have been growing ever since.

item.title: This 26-year-old’s TikTok-like AI app makes playful, creative short videos from just a few words—it’s built for Gen Z
item.description: Pika, Demi Guo's fast-growing AI video app, is taking on Meta’s Vibes and OpenAI’s Sora by turning quick prompts and selfies into shareable clips.

item.title: A History of the C.I.A.’s Involvement in Latin America, From Bay of Pigs to Chile Coups
item.description: For much of the 20th century, the C.I.A. devised plots to overthrow governments, kill high-profile leaders or arm dissident groups.

item.title: LVMH CEO Bernard Arnault sees wealth skyrocket by $19 billion overnight after months of bleeding billions as shoppers trade designer bags for luxury vacations
item.description: It may be a difficult climb for the LVMH chairman to claw back to his January high of $209 billion as researchers project a 3-year slowdown in luxury ...

item.title: Ron Conway skewers Mark Benioff in board resignation after 25 years: ‘I now barely recognize the person I have so long admired’
item.description: "San Francisco does not need a federal invasion because you don’t like paying for extra security for Dreamforce," Conway said.

item.title: Where Does the Israel-Hamas Cease-Fire Stand?
item.description: Unresolved issues — mainly over the exchange of the remains of hostages and prisoners — threaten to destabilize the fragile agreement.

item.title: Head of the U.S. Military’s Southern Command Is Stepping Down, Officials Say
item.description: Adm. Alvin Holsey is leaving less than a year into his tenure, and as the Pentagon escalates attacks against boats in the Caribbean Sea.

item.title: Where Does the Israel-Hamas Cease-Fire Stand?
item.description: Unresolved issues — mainly over the exchange of the remains of hostages and prisoners — threaten to destabilize the fragile agreement.

item.title: Kanchha Sherpa, Last Member of First Team to Conquer Everest, Dies at 92
item.description: A trip to India to find work led to a career climbing the world’s highest mountain.

item.title: Machado’s Nobel Peace Prize Brings Hope and Scrutiny to Venezuela’s Opposition

item.title: Fire in Party Office Raises Tensions as Cameroon Awaits Election Results
item.description: The blaze and arrests of protesters highlight the strife in the country, whose longtime president faced rare electoral opposition.
